It's been a profound Tuesday morning.
Jelle Klaasen back in the Premier League!
That's title number 26 this season for Michael van Gerwen. Not too shabby I suppose. He'd do alright in his annual review... #lovethedarts
This is ridiculous. MVG is from another planet. Even when he's having a touch of double trouble he's still thumping Anderson #lovethedarts
#PrayForGaryAnderson
God, this is a fucking belter. Any chance the PDC can make it best of 21 sets so we can enjoy it all night please? #lovethedarts
